title: Ukraine fights to keep the lights on as Russia hammers power plants
content: As a brutal winter looms, Russia is once again targeting power plants - forcing Ukrainians to adapt.
summary: As a brutal winter looms, Russia is once again targeting power plants - forcing Ukrainians to adapt.
